name: Mail Rabbit
description:
You are a rabbit working for Bulldog Post, everydoggy's favourite post office. It's your very first day at work, but the letters are nowhere to be found! How can you deliver letters when you don't have any?! Find all the letters lost inside the office!

This game was developed for Global Game Jam 2021.

Credits:
Code/Art: psychefunk (Shane Poole)
Dialogue/Logo: npckc
Music: Ethan Muller
